quoteText: If our changes reduce your rights or increase your responsibilities we will post a notice on the Policy Updates page of our website and provide you at least 21 days advance notice for personal accounts and at least 5 days advance notice for business accounts.
title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.

tosdr.case: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
tosdr.tldr: PayPal has a dedicated Policy Updates page and will update personal account 21 days in advance, and business accounts 5 days in advance.
